edu.soton.fpl.db

Class FantasyGameweek

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.soton.fpl.db.FantasyGameweek
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<FantasyGameweek>

    public class FantasyGameweek
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<FantasyGameweek>
    A 'gameweek' for a fantasy game Gameweeks are a collection of matches for which a fantasy manager scores points. The manager is not allowed to make changes to his team until the next gameweek.
    Author:
    Tim Matthews
